stochastic_function: lambda study_decision: {1:0.7,0:0.3,-1:0.0} if study_decision == 'study more' else {1:0.3,0:0.5,-1:0.2}

lambda current_knowledge, health_status, exam_difficulty: {1: 0.7 - 0.1*((1 - current_knowledge) + (1 - health_status) + (exam_difficulty + 1)), 0: 0.9 - (0.7 - 0.1*((1 - current_knowledge) + (1 - health_status) + (exam_difficulty + 1))), -1: 0.1} if current_knowledge in [1,0,-1] and health_status in [1,0,-1] and exam_difficulty in [1,0,-1] else {1: 0.0, 0: 0.0, -1: 0.0}
